predicate.note: Frames file for 'clone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: passive
example.text: The next *trace* *trace* to be cloned *trace*, human insulin, had market potential and Genentech licensed it to Eli Lilly, which produced 80% of the insulin used by 1.5 million U.S. diabetics.

example.name: active
example.text: John cloned himself a hundred times over, just to annoy Mary.
